item.title: Suno launches iPhone app — now you can make AI music on the go - Tom's Guide
item.description:
1. Suno launches iPhone app — now you can make AI music on the go  Tom's Guide
  2. The future of music creation? Suno's AI app hits the App Store  VentureBeat
  3. Suno releases its first mobile app after attracting 12m users  Music Ally
  4. Suno Launches Mobile App for iPhone  Maginative
  5. Suno AI music and song generator app now available for iOS devices  Neowin

item.title: Squier debuts a new Tele/Jazzmaster hybrid – and revives Fender's Les Paul-inspired 'Troublemaker'
Meta changes AI labels on Instagram and Facebook after backlash
item.description: Meta has changed its AI labels on apps like Instagram, from 'Made with AI' to 'AI info'.
